author: lresende
msg: Enhancment to allow verification of user credentials and roles in a Geronimo Java EE environment. Some code are commented out as I still need to find a more generic (not so geronimo specific way) to perform some of these actions

author: lresende
msg: Adding authorization intent to use for restricting an operation to be run only when user has a specific role

author: lresende
msg: Fixing missing atom and json-rpc javascript extension dependencies

author: ate
msg: - release:prepare is not capable of dynamically adjusting custom pom properties derived from the pom object itself when bumping the pom version in preparation for the release

author: shv
msg: HADOOP-5687. NameNode throws NPE if fs.default.name is the default value. Contributed by Philip Zeyliger.
